commentary: Here's an unusually unequivocal canon confirmation that trolls have black lips. Wait, cosplayers rarely take that literally? Oh. That's fine, I guess. I don't care. Also, it's nice to see Kanaya has such a fine array of kimonos, made just for chilling out around the house. I wonder where she got the patterns for them. Online, from Troll Japan? Wait a minute... Doc Scratch has been in contact with her. And he's been raising Damara. It's all adding up, isn't it? Yes! Wait. No, it isn't, sorry. False alarm,  go back to being confused.
